titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt unemployment benefits from Federal and State income taxation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

bill.summary: 7/29/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt unemployment compensation from Federal income tax. Amends Federal law to exempt unemployment benefits from State or local income tax.
